alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 10:54AM EST until January 15 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .The Green River along Paradise and Calhoun are expected to crest today, then gradually fall below flood stage late this week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 386.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 387.0 feet this evening. It will then fall to minor flooding Thursday evening, then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
